articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Light Industrial Factories and Department Store
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Light Industrial Factories and Department Store
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to light industrial factories in Pyongyang and the newly-built Pothonggang Department Store.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the newly-built Sanitary Goods Branch Factory at the December 7 Factory. 
					
					 After being briefed on the technical specification of the branch factory, he went round production processes furnished with cutting-edge equipment to learn in detail about its construction and production there.
					
					 Watching the work sites where cultured practices are ensured in production and hygiene on a high level and the compound of the factory that looks like a park, he highly praised its employees for having spruced up well the inside and outside of the factory. He said that the socialist homeland is turning into a land of bliss for people as the days go by as the soldier culture created in the era of Songun is kept in fuller bloom. 
					
					 The officials, workers and technicians of the branch factory with a high capacity have been able to bring about a fresh boost in the production of sanitary goods by keeping production going at a high rate because they have waged a dynamic drive for introducing new technology true to the Party's idea of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology while planting one's foot on one's ground and looking at the world, he noted, adding that this signal success clearly demonstrates the validity and vitality of the Party's policy of regarding science and technology as the lifeline for building an economic power. 
					
					 He advanced the tasks to be carried out by the factory. 
					
					 He underlined the need for the branch factory to properly work out management and business strategies and put production on a scientific basis as required by the principle of profitability so as to systematically cut down the norm of materials consumption per unit and increase the supply of quality sanitary goods to the people.   
					
					 The second leg of his guidance was the Women's Hosiery Shop newly built at the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the history of the factory in the room devoted to its history, he went round the weaving site, the processing site and the goods sample room to acquaint himself in detail with the construction and technological equipment and the production there.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the factory.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the WPK to provide the people with better living conditions, he said, underscoring the need to continue directing big efforts to the production to bring about a new turn in settling the issue of hosiery. To this end, it is necessary to steadily boost the production capacity and bring it to the world's level, he added.
					
					 He earnestly called upon the workers of the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory to boost the production and supply of quality hosiery in an effort to provide the people with richer and highly civilized living conditions as early as possible.
					
					  The next leg of his guidance was the newly built Pothonggang Department Store.
					
					 He went round the inside and outside of the store for hours to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and goods on display there.
					
					 He underlined the need to build in different parts of the country more service centers for people such as modern shops and restaurants which look like the Pothonggang Department Store so as to win the admiration of even posterity.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for improving service.
					
					 Noting that the essence of socialist commerce lies in that all its activities are conducted to serve the people from A to Z, he underscored the need for the field of commerce to supply goods from the stand of being responsible for the people's living and sell in time goods badly needed by the people to the convenience in their life.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that all service workers of the department store would bring a decisive turn in goods supply and thus make a positive contribution to giving fuller play to the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK centered on the popular masses.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, and Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Colombian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Colombian President
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to President of Colombia Juan Manuel Santos in connection with the torrential rain that hit some parts of the country for weeks, claiming huge casualties and big material losses.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the president and the government of Colombia would eradicate the aftermath of the flood damage and bring the living of the people in the afflicted areas to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Burkina Faso
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Burkina Faso
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Blaise Compaore, president of Burkina Faso, on the occasion of its 52nd national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Burkina Faso would steadily grow stronger, wishing him success in his work for the country's economic development and lasting peace and security in the region.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Angolan FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Angolan FM
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message on Thursday to Gorge Rebelo Pinto Chicoty congratulating him on his appointment as minister for external relations of Angola.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Angola would be reenergized and the mutual support and solidarity grow stronger in the international arena, wishing the minister good health and happiness and success in his new job.

articles.title: CPV Secretary Meets WPK Delegation
articles.content:
CPV Secretary Meets WPK Delegation
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The secretary of Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam who is member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPV on Thursday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, on a visit to Vietnam.
					 The Communist Party and people of Vietnam are convinced that the Korean people will achieve greater success in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the chairman said on the occasion.
					
					He noted that the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung are growing stronger as the days go by under the deep care of General Secretary Nong Duc Manh and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Communist Party and people of Vietnam always remember the unstinted assistance and encouragement rendered by the Korean people to the Vietnamese people in the period of their anti-U.S. national-salvation struggle, he said, hoping that exchange and cooperation between the two parties would be further expanded. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the CPV hosted a reception in honor of the delegation of the WPK in the evening.

articles.title: Talks Held between WPK and CPV
articles.content:
Talks Held between WPK and CPV
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Communist Party of Vietnam on Thursday.
					 Present there from the Korean side were members of the WPK delegation led by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, on a visit to Vietnam and DPRK Ambassador to Vietnam Kim Chang Il and from the Vietnamese side members of the CPV delegation headed by the chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the CPV.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on the matter of developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and issues of common concern.

articles.title: Osandok Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Osandok Prize Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Osandok prize sports contest was opened with due ceremony on Friday at the Ice Rink on the occasion of the birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Ice hockey, figure-skating, speed skating, short track speed skating and skiing events will take place in Pyongyang, Samjiyon and other places during the contest.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and sports persons.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Pak Myong Chol made an opening address.

articles.title: Industrial Establishments Updated
articles.content:
Industrial Establishments Updated
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Korean scientists and technicians have made tremendous achievements in the effort for the technological updating of industrial establishments. 
					The developers of Ryonha-trademarked machines have designed and manufactured a new model of 9-axis turning machining centre by themselves.
					
					The high-performance CNC machine tool, weighing more than 40 tons, plays a crucial role in producing high-tech goods necessary for automobile, vessel, space, air and other industrial sectors. 
					
					The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex has applied the CNC technology to the electricity management system and the electrode control system of the UHP electric arc furnace to decrease the consumption of electricity and increase the output from the furnace.
					
					The scientists and technicians of the February 8 Vinalon Complex have streamlined the existing production processes on the basis of the CNC technology.
					
					Scientists of the Computer Science Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy for a revolution in light industry, have helped light industry factories throughout the country in basing the production processes on the CNC technology.
					
					Meanwhile, a new fireworks technology was developed to add to the significance of the 65th WPK anniversary.

articles.title: New Method Applied to Young Trepang Cultivation
articles.content:
New Method Applied to Young Trepang Cultivation
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A new method of raising young trepangs in even autumn and winter seasons has been introduced into breeding ponds on reclaimed tideland on the west coast of Korea.
					 The method has made it possible to increase the weight increment of young trepangs 50 percent higher than other methods and ensure more than 95 percent in the existence rate in breeding ponds on reclaimed tideland in South Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces.
					
					 The effective method is well accepted by shallow-sea farms.
					
					 With the method developed, a major problem in trepang cultivation, that is seasonal limitations, has been solved.

articles.title: CPRK Censures Hyon In Thaek's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Censures Hyon In Thaek's Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, recently remarked that the Yonphyong Island shelling was a "last choice" of someone and that "it is necessary to project on the initiative the future of the Korean Peninsula with freedom, human rights, democracy and the market economy as values."
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released its information bulletin No. 969 on Friday to denounce his provocative remarks aimed at confrontation. 
					
					 As a continuation of the warship sinking case, heinous conspiratorial farce, the shelling incident was a premeditated military provocation invented by the present south Korean warmongers to quell the growing desire for improved inter-Korean relations and save themselves from the serious ruling crisis and create a pretext for igniting a war of aggression on the DPRK through strengthened sycophantic and treacherous collusion with outside forces, the bulletin points out, and goes on:
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is that Hyon revealed a sinister intention to escalate the confrontation between systems again with such ridiculous remarks. 
					
					 This goes to clearly show that the south Korean puppet group's racket of confrontation and war moves against the DPRK, including the Yonphyong Island shelling, are a deliberate provocation finally aimed at realizing their foolish and fantastic design for confrontation in system. 
					
					 It is as foolish an act as beating the air to seek confrontation in system with the DPRK. 
					
					 Hyon In Thaek would be well advised to step down of his own accord, as demanded by the public at home and abroad, before facing bitterer ridicules and criticism by the whole nation for his foolish remarks.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Cooperation in Munitions Slammed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Cooperation in Munitions Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The ever-closer cooperation between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in munitions precisely means the cooperation in a war of aggression against the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					  Citing facts to prove that the U.S. and the south Korean military bosses are frequently closeted over the issues of cooperation in munitions, the article notes this shows that they are not interested in peace on the Korean Peninsula at all but are hell-bent on the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The said cooperation is a direct product of the Asia-Pacific strategy of the U.S. imperialists. Their Asia-Pacific strategy is nothing but a war strategy aimed to hold upper hand of strength in this region and invade the DPRK and other Asian countries. 
					
					 What merits attention in the above-said cooperation is to boost technical exchange and cooperation for introducing and producing latest weapons and round off the operation command system for ensuring war materiel supply in "contingency."
					
					 Through the above-said cooperation the south Korean puppet forces seek to mass-produce latest war equipment and lethal weapons on the basis of new military technology provided by the U.S. and bolster up and modernize their armed forces. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. imperialists are working hard to put under their control the munitions industry of south Korea under the signboard of the munitions cooperation and fully use its military and economic potentials for carrying out their war policy.
					
					 The U.S. concluded dozens of agreements of various kinds on "wartime support," etc. with the south Korean puppet forces. The U.S. imperialists proposed newly creating "a policy committee for extended nuclear deterrence" and set forth "strategic planning guidelines," an elaboration of the OPLAN 5015, a new operational plan for invading the DPRK. All this is designed to make a more effective use of such agreements for carrying out a war of the U.S. forces.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists newly set up the U.S. forces transport headquarters in a bid to successfully ensure the supply of military materiel in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula and deployed an "advanced integrated fleet of warships" in waters around Japan. The south Korean puppet forces established a system for mobilizing all military and civilian planes, ships, etc. under the command of the U.S. forces transport headquarters in "contingency".
					
					 The U.S. imperialists would be well advised to stop the criminal munitions cooperation with the south Korean puppet forces aimed at igniting another Korean war and withdraw at once their armed forces and war materiel from south Korea, concludes the article.

articles.title: Democratization of UN Called for
articles.content:
Democratization of UN Called for
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- It is an important and urgent task of the times for establishing a new fair international order to democratize the United Nations, observes Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					 The UN is an international body which was established to prevent the recurrence of such war disaster as the Second World War but it has still failed to ward off wars and disputes worldwide, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 If the UN is to play a leading role in defending global peace, promoting the development of the international community and establishing a new fair international order it is necessary to democratize it through reforms.
					
					 Only when the UN is democratized, is it possible to ensure equality in the international relations and fairly settle all the international issues.
					
					 What is essential for doing so is to expand the UNSC reflecting the world power structure in 1945. 
					
					 The most important requirement for reforming the UNSC is to ensure the full representation and interests of the non-aligned and other developing countries.
					
					 The UNSC should be reformed in such a way as to make sure that it is represented by all regions on an equal basis, the representation of the non-aligned and other developing countries which account for the overwhelming majority of the UN member nations is fully ensured and its activities are opened to the public to the utmost. Only then will the UN be able to satisfactorily perform its mission and role as an international body.
					
					 What is also important for democratizing the UN is to raise the authority of the UN General Assembly.
					
					 Only when the UN General Assembly is given the mandate to discuss key international matters such as the issue of ensuring global peace and security and finally examine such major resolutions of the UNSC as those on sanctions and use of armed forces, in particular, is it possible to ensure impartiality in UN activities and this will contribute to holding in check highhanded and arbitrary practices of individual countries.

articles.title: Halt to Warmongers' Reckless Saber-rattling Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Warmongers' Reckless Saber-rattling Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- 30 south Korean organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification on December 6 published a joint statement denouncing the puppet warmongers' reckless saber-rattling. 
					 The statement recalled that the south Korean Ministry of Defense announced it would stage shelling simultaneously in 29 places of the East, West and South Seas of south Korea from that day, adding that they include Taechong Island, one of the five islands in the West Sea, located under the eyes of the DPRK.
					
					 It accused the newly appointed minister of Defense of crying out for attack on the north, openly disclosing his bellicose nature. 
					
					 A crisis is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula in which a war may break out any moment, the statement noted, urging the authorities to immediately stop the dangerous racket for military confrontation and opt for dialogue.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held a meeting on December 7 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Present there were Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Regional Committee of the Commonwealth of Independent States of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, and other officials and Koreans in Uzbekistan.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Uzbekistan and staff members of his embassy were present there on invitation.
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA put the Korean nation's dignity and prestige on the highest level. 
					
					 Acute confrontation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. and its followers' moves to ignite a new war, they said, warning that if the warmongers intrude into the sky, land and sea of the DPRK even an inch, the KPA will blow up the citadel for aggression with deadly blows.
					
					 They recalled that Kim Jong Suk embarked on the road of revolution in her early years and made an immortal contribution to the country's liberation and the cause of building a new country true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung, stressing that the revolutionary feats performed by her would always remain shining with the socialist country.
					
					 The participants looked round photos, books and materials for information service on display in the venue.
					
					 An art performance was given on the same day.

articles.title: Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commander Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commander Observed
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a bulletin on December 5 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin said in an article that Kim Jong Il has a view on armed forces centered on servicepersons. He said that a battle is fought by soldiers, not by arms, servicepersons are the main elements in forming armed forces and a driving force for a revolutionary war and the combat capability of an army and its victory in a war hinge on how they are prepared.
					
					 Kim Jong Il mastered a lot of books clarifying the essence of modern military science and theories and published famous works and talks on them, the bulletin said, noting that under his leadership all servicepersons of the Korean People's Army are united as firm as a rock and it achieved the unity of their ranks in thinking and purpose which no nuclear weapons can ever break.
					
					 The KPA will always demonstrate its might as invincible revolutionary armed forces under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who has an outstanding view on armed forces, the bulletin concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige varias fabricas y Almacen Pothonggang en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige varias fabricas y Almacen Pothonggang en Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno varias fabricas de industria ligera de la ciudad de Pyongyang y el Almacen Pothonggang nuevamente construido.
					  El Dirigente estuvo primero en la fabrica filial de articulos sanitarios construida recientemente en la Fabrica 7 de Diciembre.
					
					  Luego de escuchar explicaciones sobre las especificaciones tecnicas de la filial, se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y produccion recorriendo los procesos productivos dotados de equipos sofisticados.
					
					  En su recorrido por los talleres donde esta asegurada en alto nivel la cultura de produccion y vida y el recinto de la fabrica engalanado como parque, aprecio altamente el hecho de que los empleados acondicionaron magnificamente el interior y exterior de la fabrica.
					
					Subrayo que gracias a la cultura de los militares creada en la epoca del Songun, la patria socialista se va transformando cada dia como paraiso del pueblo.
					
					  Indico que el nuevo viraje, dado en la produccion de articulos sanitarios mediante la normalizacion de la produccion en esta fabrica filial de gran capacidad, es resultado de la lucha que libraron los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos por introducir la nueva tecnologia en pleno acato a la idea de nuestro partido de conquistar la tecnologia de punta ateniendose a las condiciones reales del pais y desafiando al nivel mundial.
					
					Destaco que este exito orgulloso es la manifestacion clara de la justeza y vitalidad de la politica del partido de tomar la ciencia y tecnologia como cuestion vital para la construccion de una potencia economica.
					
					Seguidamente, presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica.
					
					Senalo que la fabrica filial debe establecer la estrategia de gestion y de empresa conforme a los principios de rentabilidad y cientifizar la produccion para disminuir sistematicamente la norma de consumo de materiales por unidad de produccion y suministrar mucho a los habitantes los articulos sanitarios de buena calidad. 
					
					  Acto seguido, el Dirigente dirigio el taller de medias de la mujer construido nuevamente en la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang.
					
					  Luego de escuchar el historial de la fabrica en la sala de presentacion del mismo, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion, equipos tecnicos y produccion recorriendo el taller de tejedura, el de elaboracion y la sala de muestras.
					
					    Presento las tareas que tiene por delante esa fabrica.
					
					Facilitar mejores y magnificas condiciones de vida a los habitantes es la firme decision y voluntad de nuestro partido, senalo y destaco que es preciso registrar un nuevo viraje en la solucion del problema de medias prestando de continuo gran atencion a la produccion.
					
					  Agrego que para ese fin, hay que aumentar la capacidad productiva hasta llevarla al nivel mundial.
					
					  Encomendo encarecidamente a la clase obrera de la fabrica que produzca y suministre mucho mas medias de buena calidad para asegurarles cuanto antes las condiciones de vida mas acomodada y culta a nuestro pueblo. 
					
					Su destino final fue el Almacen Pothonggang.
					
					Recorriendo por largo tiempo el interior y el exterior del almacen, el Dirigente se informo detalladamente sobre el estado de construccion y exhibicion de mercancias.
					
					Preciso que hay que construir por doquier del pais mucho mas bases de servicios publicos como este almacen, incluyendo modernas tiendas y restaurantes que no tengan defectos hasta en el remoto futuro.
					
					El Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en fortalecer las labores de servicio.
					
					La esencia del comercio socialista esta en que todas sus actividades se centren en el servicio al pueblo, destaco y prosiguio que la rama comercial debe realizar el suministro de mercancias en la posicion de responsabilizarse de la vida del pueblo y facilitar las comodidades de vida al pueblo al venderle a tiempo los productos mas necesitados.
					
					Y expreso su gran confianza y conviccion de que todos los dependientes del almacen contribuiran activamente a poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad de nuestro regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares al lograr un viraje decisivo en el suministro de mercancias a los habitantes.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico y jefa de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, y Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a Juan Manuel Santos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a Juan Manuel Santos
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 9 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica de Colombia, Juan Manuel Santos, en relacion con que recientemente las lluvias torrenciales caidas durante varias semanas en varios lugares de Colombia  ocasionaron muchas perdidas humanas y materiales.
					  El remitente manifiesta su conviccion de que el mandatario y el gobierno de Colombia eliminaran cuanto antes la consecuencia de tales danos naturales y estabilizaran la vida de los damnificados.

articles.title: CRPP condena a Hyon In Thaek
articles.content:
CRPP condena a Hyon In Thaek
						
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el ministro titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea Hyon In Thaek dijo en tono provocativo que el incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong fue la "peor opcion" de alguien.
					Ademas, chismeo que "se debe disenar con iniciativa el futuro de la Peninsula Coreana tomando como norma de valoracion la libertad, Derechos Humanos, democracia y economia del mercado".
					
					  Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 10 la informacion No. 969.
					
					  El incidente de la isla Yonphyong es la continuacion del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", complot de pesima calana contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Especificamente, fue la provocacion militar que planificaron los actuales belicistas surcoreanos para suprimir el creciente clima a favor del mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur, salvarse de la seria crisis de dominacion y procurar el pretexto de guerra contra el Norte al fortalecer la cooperacion vendepatria con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					  Lo mas grave es que Hyon expuso otra vez el intento de oponer los regimenes de ambas partes coreanas disparateando atrevidamente que disenaria con iniciativa el futuro de la Peninsula Coreana a base de DDHH y la economia del mercado.
					
					  Este disparate demuestra que el incidente de la isla Yonphyong y otros alborotos conflictivos y guerreristas de la banda titere surcoreana contra la RPDC son provocaciones malintencionadas que tienen por su meta final buscar el enfrentamiento de regimenes.
					
					  Tratar de enfrentarse con el regimen de la RPDC es una gran tonteria igual a desafiar al cielo.
					
					  Seria mejor que Hyon renuncie a su cargo como demanda la opinion publica interna y externa, antes de que fuera ridiculizado y condenado mas fuerte por toda la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Se dinamiza la campana para conquistar tecnologias de punta
articles.content:
Se dinamiza la campana para conquistar tecnologias de punta
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Este ano, los cientificos y tecnicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea libraron activamente la campana para conquistar las tecnologias de punta en las fabricas y empresas de ramas prioritarias de la economia nacional. 
					Los desarrolladores de las maquinas de marca Ryonha inventaron la elaboradora de corte torneado con 9 ejes de nuevo tipo.
					
					Esta maquina herramienta CNC, disenada y fabricada en 100% con las tecnicas nacionales, pesa mas de 40 toneladas y cumple el rol decisivo en la produccion de accesorios sofisticados necesarios en varios sectores como la industria automovilistica, la de construccion naval, la espacial y la aerea.
					
					El desarrollo de esta maquina manifesto sin reservas el nivel de la avanzada ciencia coreana en el dominio de maquinas herramientas CNC.
					
					El Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae aplico la tecnologia CNC en el sistema de gestion electrica y el de control de electrodo del horno electrico UHP. 
					
					Este exito posibilita controlar en tiempo real el estado de consumo de electricidad, realizar de manera cientifica la distribucion de esta energia, incluso la organizacion de produccion por turno segun el plan de suministro, y aumentar la produccion en el horno UHP.
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero renovaron generalmente todos los procesos de produccion existentes uniendo sus fuerzas e inteligencias creativas, y aplicaron la tecnologia CNC a la altura de la era IT, de manera que quedara remozada su fabrica. 
					
					En acato a la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de registrar una innovacion en la industria ligera, los cientificos del Instituto de Cibernetica de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias se esforzaron activamente por modernizar segun la tecnologia CNC los procesos de produccion de varias fabricas de esa rama a lo largo del pais, incluso la ciudad de Hyesan de la provincia de Ryanggang. 
					
					La invencion de la nueva tecnologia coreana de producir y lanzar fuegos artificiales puso muy contentos a todos los militares y civiles que celebraron hace un par de meses el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					Ahora los cientificos y tecnicos coreanos trabajan con mayor entusiasmo para alcanzar metas cientificas mas altas en lo que resta de este ano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena cooperacion belica EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena cooperacion belica EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo que la cooperacion entre Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos, que se intensifica en la industria belica, tiene por su meta desatar la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Los datos reveladores de que ese imperio suele debatir los problemas de cooperacion en la industria belica junto con los cabecillas del circulo militar surcoreano demuestran que ellos no estan interesados en la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y piensan solo en los preparativos de la guerra anti-RPDC, comienza el articulista y continua:
					
					  Esa cooperacion parte de la estrategia norteamericana sobre Asia-Pacifico que persigue la guerra para tomar la supremacia en esta region y agredir a Corea y otros paises asiaticos.
					
					  Lo que llama la atencion en la polemica cooperacion es el fortalecimiento de intercambio tecnico por la introduccion y produccion de armas ultramodernas y el perfeccionamiento del sistema de mando de operaciones para abastecer de materiales belicos en el "tiempo de emergencia".
					
					  Mediante la cooperacion en industria belica, los titeres surcoreanos intentan aumentar y modernizar sus fuerzas armadas al producir en gran medida modernos equipos belicos y armas letales usando las nuevas tecnologias militares ofrecidas por EE.UU.
					
					  Por su parte, este imperio pretende controlar la industria belica del Sur de Corea y aprovechar las potencialidades militares y economicas del Sur de Corea en funcion de su politica guerrerista.
					
					Anteriormente, EE.UU. ha firmado con los titeres surcoreanos decenas de convenios de varios tipos relacionados con el "apoyo en el tiempo de guerra".
					
					  Este imperio preconiza la fundacion del "comite politico para disuadir la proliferacion nuclear" y la "guia del plan estrategico", que detalla el nuevo "plan operacional 5015" para la agresion a la RPDC, con el proposito de usar tales convenios en el cumplimiento de la guerra por sus tropas.
					
					  EE.UU. organizo nuevamente la comandancia de transporte de las tropas norteamericanas para suministrar satisfactoriamente los materiales belicos en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana y emplazo en las aguas maritimas perifericas de Japon la "flotilla cargada de materiales belicos".
					
					  Por otra parte, los titeres surcoreanos establecieron el sistema de movilizacion general de aviones militares y civiles, barcos y otros medios bajo el mando de la referida comandancia norteamericana.
					
					  EE.UU. debe poner fin a esa criminal cooperacion orientada a la nueva guerra coreana y sacar del suelo surcoreano a todas sus tropas y materiales belicos.
